description: The purpose of this microbenchmark is to provide a means to explore different programming methodologies using a simple, but not trivial, mathematical kernel. The kernel is based on the mult_su3_nn() SU(3) matrix-matrix multiply routine in the MILC Lattice Quantum Chromodynamics(LQCD) code.
name: su3_bench: Lattice QCD SU(3) matrix-matrix multiply microbenchmark (su3_bench) v1.0
